room_title: Escape room "Escape from Escobar's" by Puzzled Escape Games in Easthampton
room_description:
You and your friends were in for a great adventure South of the border but somehow ended up at the wrong place at the wrong time. Your Spanish is far from perfect and confusing the word medicine and drugs has spawned an unfortunate chain of events, and definitely didn’t help with your headache.
Now your group finds itself handcuffed inside a terrifying drug lord’s tequila cave. You have one hour to solve the puzzles and clues in order to escape a very unpleasant future. Good luck or should we say Buena Suerte!
